titleStmt.title: An answer to the letter to a dissenter, detecting the many unjust insinuations which highly reflect on His Majesty, as likewise the many false charges on the dissenters. Published with allowance.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by Henry Hills, printer to the King's most Excellent Majesty, for His houshold and chappel; and are sold at his Printing-house on the Ditch-side in Black-Fryers,

notesStmt.note: A reply to: George Saville, 1st Marquis of Halifax. A letter to a dissenter.
Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.

place.placeName: his Printing-house on the Ditch-side in Black-Fryers
